description: Windows 10 workstations are experiencing issues where critical services, specifically 'lanmanworkstation' and 'netlogon', fail to start after a system reboot. This problem has been identified on three systems out of a larger fleet of approximately 500 workstations, suggesting it may be an isolated issue but potentially indicative of a wider problem if not addressed. Users can temporarily restore functionality by manually starting the affected services, but a reboot does not resolve the underlying issue, indicating a potential flaw in the system's restart process or service dependencies.
